mapper.select: select rownum rs, b_no, we_title, we_photo1name, we_price, we_sold, we_maxsold, we_start, we_end from( select b_no, we_title, we_photo1name, we_price, we_sold, we_maxsold, TO_CHAR(we_start, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') we_start, TO_CHAR(we_end, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') we_end from group_purchase order by b_no desc) where rownum <5

SELECT b_no, we_title, we_price , we_max, we_sold, TO_CHAR(we_end, 'MM/DD') as we_end , we_photo1name, TO_CHAR(we_start, 'MM/DD') as we_start, we_maxsold , we_deposit FROM group_purchase WHERE b_no in(SELECT b_no FROM (SELECT rownum as rnum, b_no FROM (SELECT b_no FROM group_purchase nnb ORDER BY b_no DESC)) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNo} AND #{endRowNo})ORDER BY b_no DESC

SELECT b_no, we_title, we_content, we_price , we_max, we_sold, TO_CHAR(we_start, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') we_start, TO_CHAR(we_end, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') as we_end , we_photo1name, we_photo2name, we_photo3name FROM group_purchase WHERE b_no=#{b_no}
mapper.insert: Insert into payment_info (pr_no, pr_date, pr_content, pr_price, pr_id, b_no, pr_count, pr_addr, pr_tel, pr_name, pr_pay, pr_title) VALUES(mom_board_no.nextval, sysdate, #{pr_content}, #{pr_price}, #{pr_id}, #{b_no}, #{pr_count}, #{pr_addr}, #{pr_tel}, #{pr_name}, #{pr_pay}, #{pr_title)
